org.js4ms.common.util.event

Class Event<EventRecordType>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.js4ms.common.util.event.Event<EventRecordType>
  • Type Parameters:
    EventRecordType - The type of event object that will be passed to #onEvent(EventType)

    public class Event<EventRecordType>
extends Object
    An Event provides an attachment point for event handlers and a means for delivering an event record to those handlers.
    Author:
    Gregory Bumgardner

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Event() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void attach(EventListener<EventRecordType> handler)
      Attaches a handler instance to the event.
      void detach(EventListener<EventRecordType> handler)
      Detaches a handler instance from the event.
      void detachAll()
      Detaches all handler instances from the event.
      void invoke(EventRecordType record)
      Calls the EventListener#onEvent(RecordType) method on all attached event handlers passing the event object.
      boolean isEmpty() 

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        public Event()

    • Method Detail

      • attach

        public void attach(EventListener<EventRecordType> handler)
        Attaches a handler instance to the event.
        Parameters:
        handler - An object that implements the EventListener interface.

      • detach

        public void detach(EventListener<EventRecordType> handler)
        Detaches a handler instance from the event.
        Parameters:
        handler - An object that implements the EventListener interface.

      • detachAll

        public void detachAll()
        Detaches all handler instances from the event.

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()

      • invoke

        public void invoke(EventRecordType record)
        Calls the EventListener#onEvent(RecordType) method on all attached event handlers passing the event object.
        Parameters:
        event - An "event" object that will be passed to the attached event handlers.
